kpi.name: M1006C291

kpi_info.title: RRC CONN RELEASE LTE REDIR DUE TO CS CALL RELEASE
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC Connection Releases with LTE redirection information because of CS Voice Call release. Also M1006C24 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC Connection Release message to the UE, triggered by LTE redirection because of CS voice call release.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONN RELEASE LTE REDIR DUE TO CS CALL RELEASE
